Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: 1 if Team t is assigned to Project p (R1)

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: 1 if Worker w belongs to Team t (R2)

Name: assign_worker_to_role
Description: 1 if Worker w takes Role r (R4)

Name: assign_po_to_backlog
Description: 1 if ProductOwner po manages ProductBacklog pb (R5)

Name: assign_scrum_master_to_team
Description: 1 if ScrumMaster sm supports Team t (R6)

Name: put_feature_in_backlog
Description: 1 if Feature f is in ProductBacklog pb (R7)

Name: put_epic_in_backlog
Description: 1 if Epic e is in ProductBacklog pb (R8)

Name: link_userstory_to_epic
Description: 1 if UserStory us belongs to Epic e (R9)

Name: link_task_to_userstory
Description: 1 if Task tk belongs to UserStory us (R10)

Name: pick_userstory_into_sprint_backlog
Description: 1 if UserStory us is in SprintBacklog sbl (R11)

Name: link_sprint_backlog_to_sprint
Description: 1 if SprintBacklog sbl belongs to Sprint sp (R12)

Name: link_sprint_to_goal
Description: 1 if Sprint sp pursues SprintGoal sg (R13)

Name: show_task_on_scrum_board
Description: 1 if Task tk appears on ScrumBoard scb (R14)

Name: link_feature_doc_to_feature
Description: 1 if FeatureDocumentation fed belongs to Feature f (R15)

Name: link_sprint_to_development_snapshot
Description: 1 if Sprint sp generates DevelopmentSnapshot dev (R22)
